resources.string: Are you sure you want to delete your account? All information associated with your account will be deleted.
If you really want to delete your account, please enter your username in the text field below and long press on it
I really want to delete my account
Enter a new password in the text field below and confirm it, then click the change password button

Verified status can be obtained by users who have rated at least 100 movies. The relationship between the number of movies you have rated and the number of movies you need to get verified status is shown below:
Your account has already been verified. If you want to remove the verified status, click on the button below.

To add a movie, go to the \"Add\" tab. You can enter the title of the movie and click the search button to search for the movie in the movie database and fill in some fields, or you can enter all the values ​​yourself. After filling in all the fields, click on the "Save Rating For This Movie" button to add the movie to your movie list.

To view a list of movies you have rated, go to the \"Movies\" tab. It displays a list of movies you have rated with all the information about each movie. If you want to remove any movie from this list, long press on it and click \"Delete this movie\" in the dialog that opens.Please note that when you remove a movie from the list of movies you have rated, there is no way to restore it.

To view your profile, go to the \"Profile\" tab. You can change your profile picture by long pressing on it. Your profile also displays a list of your favorite movies (movies with an average rating of 100%), as well as items to change some of your profile settings. To change any of your profile settings, click on the appropriate item and follow the instructions described there.
